name: Pixel Zombie
description: The end of the world has come. Hordes of zombies swallowed the world. Defend and destroy all the zombies. Click on the running zombies and destroy them, getting bonuses. Zombies run on expensively with top in a bottom. Click on the running zombies and destroy them, getting bonuses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
